Name: StarMaker VR
About the game: StarMaker VR is a game designed using music and indicates players sing to play in the game. Listen to authorized edition music from Sony, Warner Bros., etc., and customize your character as you like! We hope that players can redefine themselves with the melodies! Features Sing Star Find any songs you want in the more than 2 million songs library. Create Karaoke rooms in SingStar, listen to music, play your favorite instruments, rate other players, sing the same song with friends, or even hold a concert in the virtual environment you created. Shooting Star Find the intensity of the music rhythm and choose either distance battle or melee to attack the digital demons, protect the music from being stolen and guard the music world. Taiko Star Use your drumsticks to beat the music note, concentrate more on the rhythm of the songs and experience the fun of drumming with the fairies and animals and get higher scores. Blade Star Slash the cubes according to the instructions. Following the directions and colors, shake your body with melodies, and release your soul. Open your music trip in StarMaker VR, and create a new music world. Enjoy yourself and release real soul into you, shaking your bodies with music rhythm in the game! Your Assistant Chat with your AI friend - Calliope, maybe there is a little surprise there.
